snippet.title: The Legend of Mystic Zone (聖域傳說), 1991, DOS
snippet.description: This game with 2D projection. Modern days... You decided to read one ancient book, open it and... In one second you wiil be transfeered inside the Book's World. There after nuclear war in the six states become chaos and bloody wars ruled by Saint King. You will finish with this hell and you must kill the Saint King to free all people living in the Book's World. Unfortunately, I could not the idea of combat mode in this game...
